ygData.subject: Re: Sonorus clouding and Undead
ygData.msgSnippet: I have found Unrest undead to be unique in the world of undead.  It is possible to invis past them, unless a hag has cast see invis on them. A brief trip to
ygData.messageBody:
I have found Unrest undead to be unique in the world of undead. It is
possible to invis past them, unless a hag has cast see invis on them.

A brief trip to lower guk dead side will set anyone straight that Clouding
does NOT invis to undead.

Perhaps it would be better to call Unrest a house of Dead, and proclaim
that Clouding will invis you to the living and the dead, but not the
undead.

Athren, professional puller from Unrest's first floor, levels 19-24
